channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How is a new pope chosen? Here's how the conclave works
item.description: Pope Francis's death sets an ancient machinery into motion. Soon, with a puff of smoke, the last absolute monarchy in Europe will get a new leader.

item.title: Sell USA? Why Trump's tariffs may be sparking a historic storm on Wall Street
item.description: When Trump announced sweeping tariffs this month, he called it "Liberation Day." But there are fears that it may well have been the day foreign invest...

item.title: See some of the most memorable moments from Pope Francis' papacy
item.description: Pope Francis was a master of making emotional connections. He was, at heart, a pastor to wounded souls. Here are some of the most memorable moments of...

item.title: The world mourns the passing of the pope
item.description: The international community reacts to the death of Pope Francis, who was a truly global figure and influence went beyond the Catholic church.

item.title: House Democrats land in El Salvador, demand Abrego Garcia's return
item.description: Unsanctioned congressional trip comes days after Sen. Chris Van Hollen, D-Md., met with Kilmar Abrego Garcia

item.title: Vatican announces death of Pope Francis aged 88
item.description: The Pope's death comes just a day after he appeared in St Peter's Square on Sunday to wish "Happy Easter" to worshippers.

item.title: Pope Francis mourned worldwide as Catholic Church prepares for next chapter
item.description: Pope Francis died Monday at the age of 88. As tributes pour in from around the world, the Vatican faces a transition.

item.title: 3/17: America Decides
item.description: WH denies ignoring court order blocking some deportations; Kennedy Center actor discusses Trump's takeover of theater

item.title: Pope Francis's last public appearance on Easter Sunday
item.description: The pontiff's last public appearance was for an Easter Sunday blessing at the Vatican's St Peter's Square.

item.title: Attempts to reach ceasefire in Ukraine littered with years of failure
item.description: The 30-hour "Easter truce" and the reported violations underscore the difficulty in securing even a brief pause in fighting.

item.title: Sri Lanka Easter bombings victims named 'heroes of faith' by Vatican
item.description: The 167 people recognised were Catholics attending mass at churches attacked by suicide bombers.

item.title: Pope Francis has died at the age of 88, the Vatican says
item.description: Pope Francis made it his mission to change the perception of the Catholic Church around the world.
